name: Numbers Hell
description:
School project for my Expressive Game Design course.

First ever game made. It's a simple dungeon like platformer made, by using Unity 2D tile system. 

You are the ghost of a mathematician stuck in Numbers Hell. Points can be earned by picking up coins, but you can also lose by killing the wrong enemy or getting hit by fans.

Pixel art is made by me.

Sound files are from Freesound.org and Playonloop.com.
